Summary: During the day of August 2, 2024, the air defense of southern Ukraine shot down 5 reconnaissance drones, of which three were of the ZALA type and two were of the Supercam type. The occupiers also attacked Odesa with three ballistic missiles, probably Iskander-M, from the territory of the temporarily occupied Crimea.

#?????????_????_20????? #??20 #ZSUYAK, THE MACHINE DRIVER OF THE CAPITAL METROPOLITAN "TRANSFERED" AT THE STEERING WHEEL OF THE RADL-KY. It's not just "doors open, next station..." It's one and a half thousand people behind you, especially at rush hour. And their safety largely rests on your shoulders. A radar station is a CRAZY responsibility. It's not just identifying targets and their characteristics, it's millions of people behind you, especially during massive missile attacks... Vadim is a senior soldier. Serves as an operator of a modern Ukrainian-made radar station. He admits: his "battlefield" is the airspace of Ukraine. His weapon is a computer mouse in his right hand, a keyboard in his left. But the contract came to an end, ahead ? an interesting job in a private company and, finally, quiet time with his family. Mykhailo did make the flight at dawn on February 24.
